extension.name: i18n Mage
config.general.title: General
config.syncBasedOnReferredEntries.desc: Use source language file as baseline when syncing; otherwise use all language files
config.projectPath.title: Project root path
config.translateServices.title: Translation Services
config.langAliasCustomMappings.desc: Custom language alias mappings (format: { 'langCode': ['alias1', 'alias2'] }), using Google Translate locale codes
config.translationHints.title: Inline Translation Hints
config.translateHintsEnableLooseKeyMatch: Enable dynamic fuzzy key matching (e.g. t(`prefix.${key}.suffix`))
config.workspace.title: Workspace Only
config.sorting.writeCode: Sorting rule when writing language files (flat structure only)
config.sorting.exportMode: Sorting rule when exporting to Excel
config.i18nFeatures.title: I18n Features
config.matchExistingKey.desc: When fixing undefined entries, prefer matching existing entries in the source language before auto-translation
config.autoTranslateMissingKey.desc: Automatically generate new entries for undefined text using translation services
config.stopWords.desc: Stop words to remove when generating keys
config.stopPrefixes.desc: Prefixes to remove when generating keys
config.maxKeyLength.desc: Maximum key length; fallback strategy will be used if exceeded
config.writeRules.title: Write Rules
config.validateLanguageBeforeTranslate.d: Validate text language before translation to filter non-source content
config.unmatchedLanguageAction.desc: Action when text does not belong to the source language
config.unmatchedLanguageAction.fill: Fill all languages with original text
config.ignorePossibleVariables.desc: Ignore strings that look like variables to avoid incorrect extraction
config.analysis.title: Analysis Rules
config.scanStringLiterals.desc: Scan string literals as potential entries
config.checkOnSave.desc: Automatically check entries on file save (debounced)
config.fileSizeSkipThresholdKB.desc: Skip checking files larger than this size (KB)
config.autoTranslateEmptyKey.desc: Automatically translate entries with empty values when fixing
config.deeplVersion.desc: Select DeepL version: free or pro
config.deeplApiKey.desc: DeepL API Key (based on selected version)
config.enableDiagnostics.desc: Enable diagnostics to highlight undefined entries and provide quick fixes
config.completion.title: Auto Completion
config.completionPinyinScope.desc: Enable pinyin search for Chinese translations
config.keyGenerationFillScope.desc: Language scope to fill when generating new keys
config.keyGenerationFillScope.minimal: Minimal – current language only (English included for English keys)
config.keyGenerationFillScope.all: Translate and fill all supported languages
config.indentSize.desc: Indent size; auto-detected if not set
config.applyToStringLiterals.desc: Apply inline translation hints to plain strings, not only i18n functions
config.invalidKeyStrategy.desc: Fallback strategy when generated key is invalid
config.invalidKeyStrategy.ai: Generate key using configured AI service
